cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kahei

sentence.kanji: 博物館で昔の貨幣を見ました。
sentence.romaji: hakubutsukan de mukashi no kahei wo mimashita
sentence.english: I saw some old money in the museum.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kabin

sentence.kanji: クリスタルガラスの花瓶を買いました。
sentence.romaji: kurisutarugarasu no kabin wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought a crystal glass vase.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otoshidama

sentence.kanji: 甥と姪にお年玉をあげたの。
sentence.romaji: oi to mei ni otoshidama wo ageta no
sentence.english: I gave New Year's pocket money to my niece and nephew.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiru

sentence.kanji: 私は昼のドラマを毎日見ます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha hiru no dorama wo mainichi mimasu
sentence.english: I watch daytime dramas every day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osoi

sentence.kanji: 前の車はとても遅い。
sentence.romaji: mae no kuruma ha totemo osoi
sentence.english: The car in front is very slow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's asobu

sentence.kanji: 子供たちが公園で遊んでいる。
sentence.romaji: kodomotachi ga kouen de asonde iru
sentence.english: The children are playing in the park.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yasashii

sentence.kanji: この問題はかなり易しいです。
sentence.romaji: kono mondai ha kanari yasashii desu
sentence.english: This problem is pretty easy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's modoru

sentence.kanji: 今、会社に戻ります。
sentence.romaji: ima kaisha ni modorimasu
sentence.english: I'm going back to the office now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kata

sentence.kanji: 肩が凝りました。
sentence.romaji: kata ga korimashita
sentence.english: My shoulders are stiff.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honya

sentence.kanji: 駅前に本屋があります。
sentence.romaji: ekimae ni honya ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a bookstore in front of the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yaoya

sentence.kanji: 八百屋でみかんを買いました。
sentence.romaji: yaoya de mikan wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought a tangerine at the grocery store.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sobaya

sentence.kanji: 昼はそば屋に行きました。
sentence.romaji: hiru ha sobaya ni ikimashita 。
sentence.english: I went to a noodle shop for lunch.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tabakoya

sentence.kanji: 私はたばこ屋でライターを買った。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha tabakoya de raita- wo kata
sentence.english: I bought a lighter from the cigarette shop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wasuremono

sentence.kanji: 学校に忘れ物をしました。
sentence.romaji: gakou ni wasuremono wo shimashita
sentence.english: I left something behind at school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinamono

sentence.kanji: その店は色々な品物を売っている。
sentence.romaji: sono mise ha iroiro na shinamono wo ute iru
sentence.english: The shop sells a lot of products.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaimono

sentence.kanji: 母は買い物に出かけています。
sentence.romaji: haha ha kaimono ni dekakete imasu
sentence.english: My mother's gone shopping.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okureru

sentence.kanji: 今朝彼女は学校に遅れました。
sentence.romaji: kesa kanojo ha gakou ni okuremashita
sentence.english: She was late for school this morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryokou

sentence.kanji: 彼女は旅行が好きです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha ryokou ga suki desu
sentence.english: She likes traveling.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nimotsu

sentence.kanji: 彼の家に荷物を送りました。
sentence.romaji: kare no ie ni nimotsu wo okurimashita
sentence.english: I sent a package to his house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kimono

sentence.kanji: 彼女は着物がよく似合います。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kimono ga yoku niaimasu
sentence.english: She looks good in a kimono.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mono

sentence.kanji: 彼女の家には物がたくさんあります。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no ie ni ha mono ga takusan arimasu
sentence.english: There are a lot of things in her house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hirumae

sentence.kanji: 昼前に会議があった。
sentence.romaji: hirumae ni kaigi ga ata
sentence.english: There was a meeting in the morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shisetsu

sentence.kanji: そのホテルにはレジャー施設がたくさんある。
sentence.romaji: sono hoteru ni ha reja- shisetsu ga takusan aru
sentence.english: There are a lot of leisure facilities in the hotel.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiruyasumi

sentence.kanji: 昼休みに公園に行った。
sentence.romaji: hiruyasumi ni kouen ni ita
sentence.english: I went to the park at lunchtime.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's asobi

sentence.kanji: お正月には色々な遊びをします。
sentence.romaji: oshougatsu ni ha iroiro na asobi wo shimasu
sentence.english: We play a lot of games at New Year's.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatemono

sentence.kanji: これは日本一古い建物です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha nihonichi furui tatemono desu
sentence.english: This is the oldest building in Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yaku

sentence.kanji: その文の訳を読みました。
sentence.romaji: sono bun no yaku wo yomimashita
sentence.english: I read a translation of that sentence.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakusu

sentence.kanji: この文を訳してください。
sentence.romaji: kono bun wo yakushite kudasai
sentence.english: Please translate this sentence.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenbutsu

sentence.kanji: 皆で東京見物をした。
sentence.romaji: minna de toukyou kenbutsu wo shita
sentence.english: We all went sightseeing in Tokyo.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's namida

sentence.kanji: 彼女の目から涙がこぼれた。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no me kara namida ga koboreta
sentence.english: Tears rolled down from her eyes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okurimono

sentence.kanji: すてきな贈り物をどうもありがとう。
sentence.romaji: suteki na okurimono wo doumo arigatou
sentence.english: Thank you for the wonderful present.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iru

sentence.kanji: 今日は一日中家に居ました。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha ichinichijuu uchi ni imashita
sentence.english: I was at home all day today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haku

sentence.kanji: 彼女はブーツを履いています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha bu-tsu wo haite imasu
sentence.english: She's wearing boots.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's to

sentence.kanji: 部屋の戸が開いています。
sentence.romaji: heya no to ga aite imasu
sentence.english: The room's door is open.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nigiru

sentence.kanji: 少女は母親の手を握った。
sentence.romaji: shoujo ha hahaoya no te wo nigita
sentence.english: The girl clasped her mother's hand.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akushu

sentence.kanji: 彼らは握手をした。
sentence.romaji: karera ha akushu wo shita
sentence.english: They shook hands.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokoya

sentence.kanji: 昨日床屋で髪を切った。
sentence.romaji: kinou tokoya de kami wo kita
sentence.english: Yesterday I had my hair cut at the barber's.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furoya

sentence.kanji: 昨日、友達とお風呂屋さんに行った。
sentence.romaji: kinou tomodachi to ofuroyasan ni ita
sentence.english: I went with a friend to a public bath yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honmono

sentence.kanji: これは本物のダイヤモンドです。
sentence.romaji: kore ha honmono no daiyamondo desu
sentence.english: This is a real diamond.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meibutsu

sentence.kanji: この町の名物はぶどうです。
sentence.romaji: kono machi no meibutsu ha budou desu
sentence.english: This town is well-known for its grapes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mochimono

sentence.kanji: 持ち物には名前を書いてください。
sentence.romaji: mochimono ni ha namae wo kaite kudasai
sentence.english: Please write your name on your belongings.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaoku

sentence.kanji: 私は木造の家屋が好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha mokuzou no kaoku ga suki desu
sentence.english: I like houses built of wood.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iremono

sentence.kanji: 荷物が多いので大きな入れ物が必要です。
sentence.romaji: nimotsu ga ooi no de ooki na iremono ga hitsuyou desu
sentence.english: There are so many items that we need a big container.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's monosashi

sentence.kanji: 30センチの物差しをください。
sentence.romaji: 30 senchi no monosashi wo kudasai
sentence.english: Please give me a 30 centimeter ruler.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okurasu

sentence.kanji: 私たちは出発を1日遅らしたの。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha shupatsu wo ichinichi okurashita no
sentence.english: We delayed our departure one day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's monooto

sentence.kanji: 物音がしたので見に行った。
sentence.romaji: monooto ga shita no de mi ni ita
sentence.english: I heard a noise so I went to look.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryokaku

sentence.kanji: その便は外国人の旅客が多かったよ。
sentence.romaji: sono bin ha gaikokujin no ryokaku ga ookata yo
sentence.english: There were a lot of foreign travelers on that flight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tabi

sentence.kanji: 姉はよく旅をします。
sentence.romaji: ane ha yoku tabi wo shimasu
sentence.english: My big sister often travels.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinbutsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は会社の重要な人物です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaisha no juuyou na jinbutsu desu
sentence.english: He is an important person in the company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyoku

sentence.kanji: 彼女はラジオ局で働いています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha rajiokyoku de hataraite imasu
sentence.english: She works for a radio station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's monooboe

sentence.kanji: 彼女は物覚えがいい。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha monooboe ga ii
sentence.english: She learns things quickly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuuenchi

sentence.kanji: この遊園地のチケットは3000円です。
sentence.romaji: kono yuuenchi no chiketo ha sanzenen desu
sentence.english: The tickets for this amusement park are 3000 yen.
